video.title: Longchenpa - Finding Rest in Illusion - Chapter 6 - That is Like an Echo - Dzogchen
video.description:
Chapter 6 - The Chapter That is Like a Echo - from the text "Finding Rest in Illusion: The Trilogy of Rest", Volume 3 by Longchenpa, translated by Padmakara Translation Group © 2018 by the Padmakara Translation Group. Produced in arrangement with Shambhala Publications, Inc. Boulder, CO.
The book can be purchased here: https://www.shambhala.com/finding-rest-in-illusion-15548.html

Tibetan master Longchenpa’s famous work that systematically presents the path of yogic conduct according to the Dzogchen tradition.

Longchen Rabjam (1308-1363), is a great luminary of Tibetan Buddhism. He was highly skilled in all aspects of scholarship from an early age and excelled throughout his life in the practice and accomplishment of the Dharma. Regarded as a great Dzogchen master, Longchenpa had many pure visions where he was given direct instructions from Guru Padmasambhava  and is recognised as an emanation of Vimalamitra. Longchenpa's prolific writings have made him one of Tibet's most renowned and precious teachers.
